mil.nga.giat.geowave.accumulo

Class AccumuloIndexWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.accumulo.AccumuloIndexWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, IndexWriter

    public class AccumuloIndexWriter
extends Object
implements IndexWriter
    This class can write many entries for a single index by retaining a single open writer. The first entry that is written will open a writer and it is the responsibility of the caller to close this writer when complete.
